titleStmt.title: The dissenter's discription of true loyalty

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold, by Andrew Sowle, at the Crooked-Billet in Holloway-Lane in Shoreditch, and the Three Keys in Nags-Head-Court in Grace-Church-Street, over against the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: At foot of page: This may be printed October the 7th 1687. R.P.
Verse - "True loyalty it doth not stand".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
